nodes.text: Thrawn's Offices were the personal offices of Imperial Grand Admiral Thrawn. One of his offices was located in his base of operations at the Lothal Imperial Factory, the other aboard his personal Star Destroyer Chimaera. In his offices, Thrawn often examined art and clues he had gathered in his quest to destroy the rebellion.

Thrawn's art collection included a Bardottan statue, holograms of ancient Lothal glyphs, the Syndulla clan's Kalikori, the old Jedi Temple Guard mask used by Kanan Jarrus during the rebels' mission to the planet Malachor, holographic examples of Mandalorian art from ancient crusades, a hologram of Hera Syndulla's family portrait from her father's office in the Syndulla residence, and a hologram of Ezra Bridger as an Imperial cadet from Imperial records. Thrawn also had a Phase II clone trooper armor helmet that had identical markings to that of Clone Commander Gree, and as well as a grail.
